import React, {Component} from "react"; import { Button, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'; import "./style.css"; class WritingCenter extends Component { state = { showModal: false, showTextModal: false, timer: "2:00", } handleModal = () => { this.setState({ showModal: !this.state.showModal }) } handleTextModal = () => { this.setState({ showTextModal: !this.state.showTextModal }) } render() { return (
Now when you click the start button you will be able to add your sentance in here.

Click this start button and you will have 2 mins.

Add your Text here

Time Remaining: {this.state.timer}
)}} export default WritingCenter;
